title: ISurface.IIntersectCurve2
signature:
System.Boolean IIntersectCurve2( 
   Curve
OtherCurve
,
   ref System.Double
CurveBound
,
   System.Int32
PointCount
,
   out System.Double
PointArray
,
   out System.Double
TArray
,

UvArray

parameters.name: CurveBound
parameters.description: Array of 6 doubles representing the start and end points of the curve

parameters.name: PointArray
parameters.description: Array of points of size PointCount*3

parameters.name: TArray
parameters.description: Array of parameters on curve of size PointCount

parameters.name: UvArray
parameters.description: Array of parameters on surface of size PointCount*2

returns: True if getting the intersection succeeded, false if not
remarks:
The curves must be bounded.
Before calling this method, call
ISurface::GetIntersectCurveCount2
to get the number of points for this surface-curve intersection.
